verses.verse: And of the blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> they made<WH6213> cloths<WH899> of service,<WH8278> to do service<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place, and made<WH6213> the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron;<WH175> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he made<WH6213> the ephod<WH646> of gold,<WH2091> blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and fine twined<WH7806> linen.<WH8336>

And they did beat<WH7554> the gold<WH2091> into thin plates,<WH6341> and cut<WH7112> it into wires,<WH6616> to work<WH6213> it in the blue,<WH8504> and in the purple,<WH713> and in the scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and in the fine linen,<WH8336> with cunning<WH2803> work.<WH4639>
They made<WH6213> shoulder pieces<WH3802> for it, to couple<WH2266> it together: by the two<WH8147> edges<WH7099> was it coupled<WH2266> together.

And the curious girdle<WH2805> of his ephod,<WH642> that was on it, was of the same, according to the work<WH4639> thereof; of gold,<WH2091> blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and fine twined<WH7806> linen;<WH8336> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And they worked<WH6213> onyx<WH7718> stones<WH68> enclosed<WH4142> in ouches<WH4865> of gold,<WH2091> graven,<WH6605> as signets<WH2368> are graven,<WH6605> with the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And he put<WH7760> them on<WH5921> the shoulders<WH3802> of the ephod,<WH646> that they should be stones<WH68> for a memorial<WH2146> to the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And he made<WH6213> the breastplate<WH2833> of cunning<WH2803> work,<WH4639> like the work<WH4639> of the ephod;<WH646> of gold,<WH2091> blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and fine twined<WH7806> linen.<WH8336>

It was foursquare;<WH7251> they made<WH6213> the breastplate<WH2833> double:<WH3717> a span<WH2239> was the length<WH753> thereof, and a span<WH2239> the breadth<WH7341> thereof, being doubled.<WH3717>
And they set<WH4390> in it four<WH702> rows<WH2905> of stones:<WH68> the first row<WH2905> was a sardius,<WH124> a topaz,<WH6357> and a carbuncle:<WH1304> this was the first<WH259> row.<WH2905>
And the second<WH8145> row,<WH2905> an emerald,<WH5306> a sapphire,<WH5601> and a diamond.<WH3095>
And the third<WH7992> row,<WH2905> a ligure,<WH3958> an agate,<WH7618> and an amethyst.<WH306>
And the fourth<WH7243> row,<WH2905> a beryl,<WH8658> an onyx,<WH7718> and a jasper:<WH3471> they were enclosed<WH4142> in ouches<WH4865> of gold<WH2091> in their settings.<WH4396>

And the stones<WH68> were according<WH5921> to the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> according<WH5921> to their names,<WH8034> like the engravings<WH6603> of a signet,<WH2368> every<WH376> one<WH376> with his name,<WH8034> according<WH5921> to the twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> tribes.<WH7626>
And they made<WH6213> on the breastplate<WH2833> chains<WH8333> at the ends,<WH1383> of wreathen<WH5688> work<WH4639> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> ouches<WH4865> of gold,<WH2091> and two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> rings;<WH2885> and put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> in the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastplate.<WH2833>
And they put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> wreathen<WH5688> chains<WH5688> of gold<WH2091> in the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> on<WH5921> the ends<WH7098> of the breastplate.<WH2833>

And the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the two<WH8147> wreathen<WH5688> chains<WH5688> they fastened<WH5414> in the two<WH8147> ouches,<WH4865> and put<WH5414> them on<WH5921> the shoulder pieces<WH3802> of the ephod,<WH646> before<WH413> it.

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> of gold,<WH2091> and put<WH7760> them on<WH5921> the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastplate,<WH2833> on the border<WH8193> of it, which<WH834> was on<WH413> the side<WH5676> of the ephod<WH646> inward.<WH1004>

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> other golden<WH2091> rings,<WH2885> and put<WH5414> them on<WH5921> the two<WH8147> sides<WH3802> of the ephod<WH646> underneath,<WH4295> toward<WH4136> the forepart<WH6440> of it, over<WH5980> against<WH5980> the other coupling<WH4225> thereof, above<WH4605> the curious girdle<WH2805> of the ephod.<WH646>

And they did bind<WH7405> the breastplate<WH2833> by his rings<WH2885> to the rings<WH2885> of the ephod<WH646> with a lace<WH6616> of blue,<WH8504> that it might be above<WH5921> the curious girdle<WH2805> of the ephod,<WH646> and that the breastplate<WH2833> might not be loosed<WH2118> from the ephod;<WH646> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he made<WH6213> the robe<WH4598> of the ephod<WH646> of woven<WH707> work,<WH4639> all<WH3632> of blue.<WH8504>

And there was an hole<WH6310> in the middle<WH8432> of the robe,<WH4598> as the hole<WH6310> of an habergeon,<WH8473> with a band<WH8193> round<WH5439> about the hole,<WH6310> that it should not rend.
And they made<WH6213> on the hems<WH7757> of the robe<WH4598> pomegranates<WH7416> of blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and twined<WH7806> linen.

And they made<WH6213> bells<WH6472> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and put<WH5414> the bells<WH6472> between<WH8432> the pomegranates<WH7416> on the hem<WH7757> of the robe,<WH4598> round<WH5439> about between<WH8432> the pomegranates;<WH7416>

A bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate,<WH7416> a bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate,<WH7416> round<WH5439> about the hem<WH7757> of the robe<WH4598> to minister<WH8334> in; as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And they made<WH6213> coats<WH3801> of fine linen<WH8336> of woven<WH707> work<WH4639> for Aaron,<WH175> and for his sons,<WH1121>
And a turban<WH4701> of fine linen,<WH8336> and goodly<WH6287> bonnets<WH4021> of fine linen,<WH8336> and linen<WH906> breeches<WH4370> of fine twined<WH7806> linen,<WH8336>
And a girdle<WH73> of fine twined<WH7806> linen,<WH8336> and blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> of needlework;<WH7551> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And they made<WH6213> the plate<WH6731> of the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and wrote<WH3789> on it a writing,<WH4385> like to the engravings<WH6603> of a signet,<WH2368> HOLINESS<WH6944> TO THE LORD.<WH3068>
And they tied<WH5414> to it a lace<WH6616> of blue,<WH8504> to fasten<WH5414> it on high<WH4605> on the turban;<WH4701> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Thus was all<WH3605> the work<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> finished:<WH3615> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> did<WH6213> they.

And they brought<WH935> the tabernacle<WH4908> to Moses,<WH4872> the tent,<WH168> and all<WH3605> his furniture,<WH3627> his clasps,<WH7165> his boards,<WH7175> his bars,<WH1280> and his pillars,<WH5982> and his sockets,<WH134>
And the covering<WH4372> of rams'<WH352> skins<WH5785> dyed red,<WH119> and the covering<WH4372> of badgers'<WH8476> skins,<WH5785> and the veil<WH6532> of the covering,<WH4539>
The ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> and the staves<WH905> thereof, and the mercy<WH3727> seat,
The table,<WH7979> and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof, and the show bread,<WH3899>

The pure<WH2889> candlestick,<WH4501> with the lamps<WH5216> thereof, even with the lamps<WH5216> to be set in order,<WH4634> and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof, and the oil<WH8081> for light,<WH3974>
And the golden<WH2091> altar,<WH4196> and the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and the sweet<WH5561> incense,<WH7004> and the hanging<WH4539> for the tabernacle<WH168> door,<WH6607>
The brazen<WH5178> altar,<WH4196> and his grate<WH4345> of brass,<WH5178> his staves,<WH905> and all<WH3605> his vessels,<WH3627> the laver<WH3595> and his foot,<WH3653>

The hangings<WH7050> of the court,<WH2691> his pillars,<WH5982> and his sockets,<WH134> and the hanging<WH4539> for the court<WH2691> gate,<WH8179> his cords,<WH4340> and his pins,<WH3489> and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> of the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> for the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150>

The cloths<WH899> of service<WH8278> to do service<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place, and the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> and his sons'<WH1121> garments,<WH899> to minister<WH8334> in the priest's<WH3547> office.
According to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> made<WH6213> all<WH3605> the work.<WH5656>

And Moses<WH4872> did look<WH7200> on all<WH3605> the work,<WH4399> and, behold,<WH2009> they had done<WH6213> it as the LORD<WH3068> had commanded,<WH6680> even so<WH3651> had they done<WH6213> it: and Moses<WH4872> blessed<WH1288> them.
